Traditional Box Braids.review_text: Absolutely love my box braids!!! They're so neat and well-done. Highly recommend.
Had a great experience getting my box braids done at home. They look amazing and Nicki was very professional.
Perfect braids! Nicki was friendly and very attentive to details.
These box braids are exactly what I wanted. Nicki did an excellent job!

Cornrows.review_text: Very beautiful cornrows. This is my 3rd time and I must say, Nicki is skilled and quick. Will definitely book again!
My cornrows look amazing! Nicki did a fantastic job. On time, professional and so nice!! Highly highly recommended!!
Very pleased with the style! Neat and stylish. Great service overall. Thank you Nicki. See you next time Dear.
